Source code for simplecv.utils.visualize

import cv2 as cv
import os
import os.path as osp

from enum import Enum
from pathlib import Path



[docs]class Color(Enum):
    red = (0, 0, 255)
    green = (0, 255, 0)
    blue = (255, 0, 0)
    white = (255, 255, 255)
    black = (0, 0, 0)




[docs]def draw_bbox(anns, img, top, color_val):
    if not isinstance(anns, list):
        return None
    for i, ann in enumerate(anns, 1):
        x, y, w, h = [int(v) for v in ann["bbox"]]
        left_bottom = (x, y - 2) if top else (x, y + h + 30)
        text = "{}: {}: {:.2f}".format(i, ann["label"], ann.get("score", 1.0))
        cv.rectangle(img, (x, y), (x + w - 1, y + h - 1), color_val, thickness=1)
        cv.putText(img, text, left_bottom, cv.FONT_HERSHEY_COMPLEX, 1.0, color_val)
    return img




[docs]def image_show(out_dir, ori_file, dt, gt, dt_mask=None, gt_mask=None):
    if dt_mask is not None:
        dt = [d for d, flag in zip(dt, dt_mask) if flag == 1]

    if gt_mask is not None:
        gt = [g for g, flag in zip(gt, gt_mask) if flag == 1]

    out_img = cv.imread(ori_file, 1)
    draw_bbox(dt, out_img, True, Color.red.value)
    draw_bbox(gt, out_img, False, Color.green.value)
    cv.putText(out_img, Path(ori_file).parent.name, (50, 30), cv.FONT_HERSHEY_COMPLEX, 1.0, (0, 0, 255))

    out_file = osp.join(out_dir, Path(ori_file).name)
    os.makedirs(out_dir, exist_ok=True)
    cv.imwrite(out_file, out_img)
    return out_file
